report_objective: Create a comprehensive, actionable task breakdown of the Audityzer Web3 Security Platform visual strategy document. Organize all visual design requirements into prioritized phases with specific tasks, dependencies, success criteria, and resource requirements for development and design teams.

visual_guidelines.typography: Clean, modern sans-serif fonts emphasizing readability
visual_guidelines.aesthetic: Minimal, professional design with subtle futuristic elements
visual_guidelines.iconography: Consistent security-focused icon set (shields, locks, networks)
visual_guidelines.data_visualization: Clean charts and graphs following UX best practices

implementation_phases.objective: Establish the core visual identity of the platform with essential, high-impact assets for the homepage and primary feature demonstrations.

tasks.description: Create the main hero banner for the homepage to establish immediate trust and communicate platform capabilities.
visual_elements: Futuristic security dashboard with real-time threat detection
Clean, professional aesthetic with gradient backgrounds
tasks.placement: Top of homepage, above the fold
dependencies: Finalized brand color palette and typography
tasks.ai_prompt_guidance: Professional Web3 security platform dashboard interface, showing real-time blockchain vulnerability scanning with holographic network nodes, clean blue-cyan color scheme, modern UI design, threat detection overlays, code analysis panels, enterprise-grade aesthetic, 4K resolution, professional lighting, minimal design with security shield elements
success_criteria: Asset conveys trust, technical sophistication, and enterprise-grade reliability.
Adheres to 1920x1080 minimum resolution and WebP format.
Uses approved color palette and fonts.
Effectively communicates core platform value proposition at a glance.

tasks.description: Develop high-fidelity mockups of the main security dashboard to be used in feature sections and product demos.
visual_elements: Real-time threat monitoring interfaces showing live vulnerability scans
Risk assessment matrices with color-coded severity levels
Compliance reporting dashboards with audit trails
dependencies: Product team input on UI features
tasks.ai_prompt_guidance: Advanced cybersecurity control center with multiple monitors displaying smart contract analysis, vulnerability heat maps, threat intelligence feeds, code scanning results, professional dark theme with neon accents, futuristic but clean design, enterprise security operations center aesthetic
success_criteria: Mockups are detailed and realistic (4K resolution).
Clearly visualize key platform features like threat monitoring and risk assessment.
Consistent with hero banner aesthetic.
Color-coding for severity is intuitive and accessible.

tasks.description: Create clean screenshots of specific analysis tools to highlight platform capabilities.
visual_elements: Smart contract code analysis with highlighted vulnerabilities
Fuzzing engine results displaying test coverage
tasks.ai_prompt_guidance: Smart contract code editor with AI-powered vulnerability highlighting, security annotations, risk assessment sidebar, clean IDE interface, professional developer tools aesthetic, syntax highlighting, security warnings and recommendations overlay
success_criteria: Screenshots clearly highlight the specified features.
Vulnerabilities and results are easy to understand.
Maintain visual consistency with dashboard mockups.

tasks.description: Illustrate the high-level system architecture to explain the platform's technical foundation.
tasks.ai_prompt_guidance: Clean technical architecture diagram showing multi-layer Web3 security framework, interconnected nodes representing blockchain networks, security plugins, and analysis engines, professional infographic style, blue and white color scheme, enterprise documentation quality
success_criteria: Diagram is clear, accurate, and understandable for a technical audience.
Uses SVG format for scalability.
Adheres to brand style guide for colors and fonts.

implementation_phases.objective: Develop detailed visuals for advanced platform features, integrations, and reporting to showcase the depth of Audityzer's capabilities.

tasks.description: Create detailed mockups for secondary hero images and feature pages, focusing on specific analysis tools.
visual_elements: Smart contract visualization with code analysis overlays
dependencies: Product team specifications for each tool
tasks.ai_prompt_guidance: Adapt prompts from P1-T2 and P1-T3 for specific features like multi-chain monitoring or AI detection.
success_criteria: Each visual clearly communicates the value of a specific advanced tool.
Maintains brand consistency established in Phase 1.
Looks professional and sophisticated.

tasks.description: Design the interface for the plugin marketplace, showing available security tools and developer integrations.
visual_elements: Plugin marketplace interface showing security tools
Plugin ecosystem architecture with developer tools
dependencies: Product team requirements for marketplace functionality
success_criteria: Interface is intuitive and visually appealing.
Effectively showcases the ecosystem of available tools.
Consistent with overall platform design.

tasks.task_name: Develop Integration and Process Flow Diagrams
tasks.description: Create detailed diagrams illustrating integration flows and security processes.
dependencies: Input from engineering and security teams on processes
tasks.ai_prompt_guidance: Adapt prompt from P1-T4 for specific workflows like 'incident response process' or 'compliance validation flowchart'.
success_criteria: Flows are accurate and easy to follow for technical stakeholders.
Complex processes are simplified visually.
All diagrams use a consistent style and SVG format.

implementation_phases.objective: Develop a suite of visual assets focused on building market credibility, showcasing real-world applications, and establishing industry trust.

tasks.description: Develop illustrations for specific industry security scenarios to make the platform's value tangible to both technical and business stakeholders.
dependencies: Marketing team strategy on target use cases
success_criteria: Illustrations clearly depict the scenario and the platform's role.
Visually engaging and aligned with brand style.
Effectively communicates value to target personas.

tasks.description: Create or source a set of badges to visually represent security compliance, achievements, and endorsements.
dependencies: Confirmation of actual certifications and achievements from compliance/legal.
success_criteria: Badges are professional, recognizable, and used appropriately.
Consistently styled and rendered in SVG format.

tasks.description: Capture professional photos and visuals of the team and their activities to build human trust and showcase expertise.
visual_elements: Professional team photos in modern tech environments
success_criteria: Photos are high-quality and professional.
Reflect the company's modern, tech-focused, and reliable culture.
Team appears approachable and expert.

visual_consistency.description: Ensure all assets adhere to a unified visual language.
checklist: Maintain consistent color schemes across all assets.
Ensure a cohesive visual identity across all platform components and marketing materials.

technical_compliance.description: Verify that all visuals meet technical and accessibility standards.
checklist: Implement responsive design principles for multi-device compatibility.
Ensure accessibility compliance for all visual elements (e.g., color contrast, alt text).
Use appropriate, optimized file formats (SVG, PNG, WebP).

security_first_messaging.description: Confirm that visuals reinforce the core message of trust and security.
checklist: Emphasize enterprise-grade security in all visuals.
Demonstrate comprehensive coverage across Web3 ecosystems.
